name: Barrimean Jungle
description: Barrimean Jungle is a first-person game, which we prepared with the most exotic spices. You play as John, who has traveled to different corners of the world more than once. Are you sure about this?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 3.1 GHz Graphics: GTX 750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 6640 MB available space
